meanings.definition: The study of cohomology groups in mathematics.
meanings.sent1: In math class, we learned about cohomology and its importance.
meanings.sent2: The cohomology of a shape helps us understand its properties better.
meanings.sent3: The cohomology of the numbers was like solving a mystery.
meanings.sent4: Her understanding of cohomology was as clear as a sunny day.
meanings.sent5: The teacher made cohomology come alive with colorful diagrams.

meanings.definition: The cohomology of a topological space is a way of associating a sequence of abelian groups or modules with the space.
meanings.sent1: Studying the cohomology of a shape can reveal hidden patterns.
meanings.sent2: The cohomology of the city map helped plan the new roads.
meanings.sent3: The cohomology of the puzzle pieces made them fit perfectly together.
meanings.sent4: The cohomology of the garden was like a beautiful tapestry.
meanings.sent5: Understanding the cohomology of the building blocks was crucial for the project.
